execution_plan.description: Retrieve products from store_main.created today (based on products.created_at).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, name, category_id, price, sku, is_active AS active, created_at, 'store_main' AS source_db FROM products WHERE created_at::date = CURRENT_DATE;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve items from store_alt created today (based on items.created_on). Map columns to product-like names for application-level aggregation.
execution_plan.query: SELECT code AS id, title AS name, group_ref AS category_id, NULL::numeric(10,2) AS price, amount_in_cents AS price_cents, NULL::text AS sku, (active = 'Y') AS active, created_on AS created_at, 'store_alt' AS source_db FROM items WHERE created_on = CURRENT_DATE;
